import java.util.Scanner;

 
/**
 *
 * @author Adithya Rao
 */
class Game_Theory 
{
    public static void main(String args[])
    {
        Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
        int t = in.nextInt();
        int i = 0; 
        while(i < t)
        {
            String name = in.next();
            int [] chars = new int[26];
            String giv_str = in.next();
            for(int j = 0 ; j < 26 ; ++j)
            {
                chars[j] = 0;
            }
            for(int j = 0 ; j < giv_str.length() ; ++j)
            {
                ++chars[giv_str.charAt(j)-'a'];
            }
            int ans = 0;
             for(int j = 0 ; j < 26 ; ++j)
            {
                ans = ans ^ chars[j];
            }
            if(ans == 0)
            {
                if(name.equals("Tarun"))
                    System.out.println("Varun");
                else
                    System.out.println("Tarun");
            }
            else
            {
                System.out.println(name);
            }
            
            ++i;
        }
    }
    
}
